com.salesforce.androidsdk.rest.files
Class FileRequests

java.lang.Object
  com.salesforce.androidsdk.rest.files.FileRequests

public class FileRequests
extends java.lang.Object

This defines the HTTP requests in the connect API for files functionality.

Author:
sfell

Method Detail

ownedFilesList

public static RestRequest ownedFilesList(java.lang.String userId,
                                         java.lang.Integer pageNum)
Build a Request that can fetch a page from the files owned by the specified user.

Parameters:
userId - if null the context user is used, otherwise it should be an Id of a user.
pageNum - if null fetches the first page, otherwise fetches the specified page.
Returns:
A new RestRequest that can be used to fetch this data

filesInUsersGroups

public static RestRequest filesInUsersGroups(java.lang.String userId,
                                             java.lang.Integer pageNum)
Build a Request that can fetch a page from the list of files from groups that the user is a member of.

Parameters:
userId - if null the context user is used, otherwise it should be an Id of a user.
pageNum - if null fetches the first page, otherwise fetches the specified page.
Returns:
A new RestRequest that can be used to fetch this data

filesSharedWithUser

public static RestRequest filesSharedWithUser(java.lang.String userId,
                                              java.lang.Integer pageNum)
Build a Request that can fetch a page from the list of files that have been shared with the user.

Parameters:
userId - if null the context user is used, otherwise it should be an Id of a user.
pageNum - if null fetches the first page, otherwise fetches the specified page.
Returns:
A new RestRequest that can be used to fetch this data

fileDetails

public static RestRequest fileDetails(java.lang.String sfdcId,
                                      java.lang.String version)
Build a Request that can fetch the file details of a particular version of a file.

Parameters:
sfdcId - The Id of the file
version - if null fetches the most recent version, otherwise fetches this specific version.
Returns:
A new RestRequest that can be used to fetch this data

batchFileDetails

public static RestRequest batchFileDetails(java.util.List<java.lang.String> sfdcIds)
Build a request that can fetch the latest file details of one or more files in a single request.

Parameters:
sfdcIds - The list of file Ids to fetch.
Returns:
A new RestRequest that can be used to fetch this data

fileRendition

public static RestRequest fileRendition(java.lang.String sfdcId,
                                        java.lang.String version,
                                        RenditionType renditionType,
                                        java.lang.Integer pageNum)
Build a Request that can fetch the a preview/rendition of a particular page of the file (and version)

Parameters:
sfdcId - The Id of the file
version - if null fetches the most recent version, otherwise fetches this specific version
renditionType - What format of rendition do you want to get
pageNum - which page to fetch, pages start at 0.
Returns:
A new RestRequest that can be used to fetch this data

fileContents

public static RestRequest fileContents(java.lang.String sfdcId,
                                       java.lang.String version)
Builds a request that can fetch the actual binary file contents of this particular file.

Parameters:
sfdcId - The Id of the file
version - The version of the file
Returns:
A new RestRequest that can be used to fetch this data

fileShares

public static RestRequest fileShares(java.lang.String sfdcId,
                                     java.lang.Integer pageNum)
Build a Request that can fetch a page from the list of entities that this file is shared to.

Parameters:
sfdcId - The Id of the file.
pageNum - if null fetches the first page, otherwise fetches the specified page.
Returns:
A new RestRequest that can be used to fetch this data

addFileShare

public static RestRequest addFileShare(java.lang.String fileId,
                                       java.lang.String entityId,
                                       java.lang.String shareType)
Build a request that will add a file share for the specified fileId to the specified entityId

Parameters:
fileId - the Id of the file being shared.
entityId - the Id of the entity to share the file to (e.g. a user or a group)
shareType - the type of share (V - View, C - Collaboration)
Returns:
A new RestRequest that be used to create this share.

deleteFileShare

public static RestRequest deleteFileShare(java.lang.String shareId)
Build a request that will delete the specified file share.

Parameters:
shareId - The Id of the file share record (aka ContentDocumentLink)
Returns:

uploadFile

public static RestRequest uploadFile(java.io.File theFile,
                                     java.lang.String name,
                                     java.lang.String description,
                                     java.lang.String mimeType)
                              throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
Build a request that can upload a new file to the server, this will create a new file at version 1.

Parameters:
theFile - The path of the local file to upload to the server.
name - The name/title of this file.
description - A description of the file.
mimeType - The mime-type of the file, if known.
Returns:
A RestRequest that can perform this upload.
Throws:
java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
